verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֡ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you הַקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> hak-Rev And take אֵלֶיךָ֩ <WH413> 'e-lei-Cha about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron thou unto thee Aaron אָחִ֜יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> ba-Nav and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> it-To, from מִתּ֛וֹךְ <WH8432> mit-Toch with him from among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <WH3547> le-cha-ha-nov- that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י Li; אַהֲרֹ֕ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron [even] Aaron נָדָ֧ב <WH5070> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֛וּא <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְאִיתָמָ֖ר <WH385> ve-'i-ta-Mar and Ithamar בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron. Aaron's

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> vig-dei- garments קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh holy לְאַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> le-'a-ha-Ron for Aaron אָחִ֑יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha; thy brother לְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> le-cha-Vod for glory וּלְתִפְאָֽרֶת׃ <WH8597> u-le-tif-'A-ret. and for beauty

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah, You תְּדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> te-dab-Ber And thou shalt speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all חַכְמֵי־ <WH2450> chach-mei- unto all [that are] wise לֵ֔ב <WH3820> Lev, hearted אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom מִלֵּאתִ֖יו <WH4390> mil-le-Tiv whom I have filled ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach with the spirit חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> choch-mah of wisdom וְעָשׂ֞וּ <WH6213> ve-'a-Su that they may make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּגְדֵ֧י <WH899> big-Dei garments אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron's לְקַדְּשׁ֖וֹ <WH6942> le-kad-de-Sho to consecrate לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <WH3547> le-cha-ha-nov- him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃ Li.

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These הַבְּגָדִ֜ים <WH899> hab-be-ga-Dim And these [are] the garments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יַעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> ya-'a-Su, which they shall make חֹ֤שֶׁן <WH2833> Cho-shen a breastplate וְאֵפוֹד֙ <WH646> ve-'e-fOd and an ephod וּמְעִ֔יל <WH4598> u-me-'Il, and a robe וּכְתֹ֥נֶת <WH3801> u-che-To-net coat תַּשְׁבֵּ֖ץ <WH8665> tash-Betz and a broidered מִצְנֶ֣פֶת <WH4701> mitz-Ne-fet a mitre וְאַבְנֵ֑ט <WH73> ve-'av-Net; and a girdle וְעָשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> ve-'a-Su and they shall make בִגְדֵי־ <WH899> vig-dei- garments קֹ֜דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh holy לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> le-'a-ha-Ron for Aaron אָחִ֛יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother וּלְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> u-le-va-Nav and his sons לְכַהֲנוֹ־ <WH3547> le-cha-ha-nov- that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃ Li.

וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> ve-Hem They יִקְח֣וּ <WH3947> yik-Chu And they shall take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> haz-za-Hav, gold וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַתְּכֵ֖לֶת <WH8504> hat-te-Che-let and blue וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָֽאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <WH713> ha-'ar-ga-Man; and purple וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et תּוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> to-La-'at oppressor הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> hash-sha-Ni and the scarlet וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַשֵּֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8336> hash-Shesh. and fine linen פ Peh

וְחֵ֤שֶׁב <WH2805> ve-Che-shev And the curious girdle אֲפֻדָּתוֹ֙ <WH642> a-fud-da-To of the ephod אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, and כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֖הוּ <WH4639> ke-ma-'a-Se-hu which [is] upon it shall be of the same according to the work מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu of the same יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh; become זָהָ֗ב <WH2091> za-Hav, thereof [even of] gold תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> te-Che-let [of] blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh linen מָשְׁזָֽר׃ <WH7806> ma-she-Zar. and fine twined

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <WH3947> ve-La-kach-ta, And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁתֵּ֖י <WH8147> she-Tei two אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> 'av-nei- stones שֹׁ֑הַם <WH7718> Sho-ham; onyx וּפִתַּחְתָּ֣ <WH6605> u-fit-tach-Ta and grave עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, on שְׁמ֖וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot on them the names בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel
